TarapotoClasico.descripcion: Get ready for a tour full of adventure and nature! In 4 days, we will explore the incredible landscapes of Tarapoto and its surroundings. We start with the stunning Ahuashiyacu Falls, followed by a relaxing bath in the Tío Yaku hot springs, and then head to the magical Laguna Azul for a boat ride and adventure activities. We will also explore the charming town of Lamas, with its viewpoints and castle, and enjoy the local culture. Each day is filled with spectacular views and unique experiences that will leave you with unforgettable memories.

dia1.descripcion: Day 1! We arrive in Tarapoto and head to the hotel. Then, the adventure begins! First, we go to Lamas Nativa to enjoy its unique vegetation. We stop at the Natural Viewpoint of Lamas (where we can take incredible photos!), then explore the Castle of Lamas and end in the Huayco neighborhood, where we can dance to the local rhythm and take home some handicrafts to remember this magical day! The tour ends near the hotel, and it’s time to rest!

dia2.descripcion: Day 2! We start the day with a delicious breakfast at the hotel and then head to López port, where we cross the Huallaga River by boat with an incredible view. We visit the Tayta Maki Viewpoint, one of the most impressive in the area, and have time to take photos. Then, we enjoy a typical lunch near Laguna Azul. In the afternoon, we navigate by boat through the lagoon while listening to the local legend, and then we dive into adventure activities and swimming! At the end of the day, we return to the port and transfer to the hotel to rest.

dia3.descripcion: Day 3! After breakfast at the hotel, we head to Moyobamba to visit the Orchidarium and enjoy a tasting of coffees and ice creams. Then, we go to Rioja to relax in the Tío Yaku hot springs and to San Mateo for more hot springs. At noon, we have lunch with typical dishes from the area. We end the day with a coffee-making and tasting experience before returning to Tarapoto to rest.

dia4.descripcion: Last day! We start with breakfast at the hotel and then head south of Tarapoto, enjoying the fauna and flora of the region. We visit the beautiful Ahuashiyacu Falls, where we will have an hour to swim, have fun, and take photos. Afterward, we return to Tarapoto, where the tour ends around 1:00 PM, and we head to the hotel to collect our things. Finally, we transfer to the airport, 2 hours before the flight, to conclude the service.

seo.meta_description: Experience a unique adventure in Tarapoto for 5 days, visiting Lamas, the Blue Lagoon, Ahuashiyacu Falls, and much more. Explore the jungle and culture of the Peruvian Amazon!

open_graph.title: Tarapoto 5 Days - 5 Days / 4 Nights
open_graph.description: Enjoy 5 days of adventure in the Tarapoto jungle, visiting the Blue Lagoon, Ahuashiyacu Falls, and more. Book your tour now!

Tarapoto5dias.title: TARAPOTO
puntosClave: Tour to Lamas, with spectacular views and a unique castle.
Visit Laguna Azul with boat and horseback rides.
Refresh yourself at the 40-meter Ahuashiyacu Waterfall.
Hike to the Carpichuyacu waterfalls and thermal baths.
Comfortable transfers between the airport and the hotel.
Tarapoto5dias.lugares: City of Lamas, Laguna Azul, Ahuashiyacu Waterfall, Carpichuyacu Waterfall ("Pishurayacu")
Tarapoto5dias.descripcion: Embark on an exciting adventure of 5 days and 4 nights in the magical jungle of Tarapoto! Explore the charming city of Lamas, famous for its natural viewpoint and iconic castle. Immerse yourself in the beauty of Laguna Azul, surrounded by legends, and marvel at the majestic Ahuashiyacu Waterfall, where you can enjoy a refreshing swim. Additionally, you will visit the stunning Carpichuyacu waterfall (Pishurayacu), a true natural paradise. Join Machupicchu By World and experience the jungle like never before!

descripcion: Explore Lamas, the Folkloric Capital of Peruvian Amazon, known as the City of Three Floors. We will start the day at a natural viewpoint with spectacular views of the native community. Then, we will visit the Bajo Mayo Valley to see a castle built in 2005, a popular tourist attraction. Afterward, you will interact with the local community, learning about their crafts and having the opportunity to buy souvenirs. This tour promises fun and immersion in the customs of Lamas. At the end, you will return to Tarapoto to spend the night at your hotel.

After breakfast at the hotel, our transportation will pick up passengers between 8:00 and 8:30 AM to take them to Laguna Azul, located 50 km south of Tarapoto. During the journey, enjoy views of the Huallaga River from the Balsa Cautiva boat, and we will stop at a natural viewpoint to appreciate the landscape. Upon arrival in Sauce, we will navigate in a motorboat to a tourist center where various activities can be carried out, such as swimming in the lagoon and horseback riding (optional). At noon, a lunch with local products will be offered. The tour will conclude in the afternoon, and that night you will spend in Tarapoto.

At 10:00 AM, after a breakfast with local products, we will head to Ahuashiyacu Waterfall, located 14 km from Tarapoto. This attraction, 40 meters high, is ideal for the whole family and offers a route that highlights the beauty of the jungle's forests. Upon arrival, you can enjoy its waters and refresh yourself in a pool. The return to the city is scheduled between 1:00 and 1:30 PM, ending near the main square, where you can taste local cuisine before spending the night in Tarapoto.

Between 9:00 and 9:30 AM, we will pick up passengers at their hotel to head to a nearby location. We will start a hike of approximately 40 minutes, crossing a river on a handmade raft. Along the way, we will enjoy various species of flora and fauna from the region. The hike has two stages that lead us to the Carpichuyacu waterfalls, where you can enjoy a refreshing swim. After the visit, we will return to the San José community to enjoy thermal baths known for their healing properties. This tour is ideal for nature lovers and those in good physical condition.

After enjoying the last breakfast, transportation will make the respective transfer from the hotel to the Guillermo del Castillo Airport. The recommendations according to each airline's flight is to be present 2 hours before your flight. The transfer will be coordinated accordingly, and our tour will conclude with this transfer.

seo.meta_description: Discover the magic of Arequipa on a 5-day tour, visiting the Route of the Sillar, Colca Valley, Laguna de Salinas, and more. A unique experience of nature and culture!

open_graph.title: Arequipa 5 Days - 5 Days / 4 Nights
open_graph.description: Embark on a 5-day adventure in Arequipa, exploring the Route of the Sillar, Colca Valley, and Laguna de Salinas. Book your spot now and don’t miss this experience!

Arequipa5dias.title: AREQUIPA
puntosClave: Get ready to explore wonders like the Ruta del Sillar, the imposing Colca Valley, and the magical Laguna de Salinas!
Includes tourist transport, professional guide, and permanent assistance throughout the trip.
Includes accommodation in comfortable hotels and breakfasts as per the itinerary.
Combines nature, history, and culture with activities like condor watching, flamingos, and petroglyphs.
Guarantees organized transfers to and from the airport or land terminal.
Arequipa5dias.lugares: Arequipa - Colca Valley - Cruz del Cóndor Viewpoint - Laguna de Salinas - Sillar Quarries.
Arequipa5dias.descripcion: Get ready for a unique experience of 5 days and 4 nights filled with adventures and stunning landscapes! This tour will take you to explore the historic Arequipa and its surroundings, starting with a tour of the sillar quarries and the Culebrillas Ravine, where you will discover the richness of the Wari culture. Then, you will delve into the Colca Valley, home to majestic condors and surrounded by imposing mountains, to enjoy its hot springs and panoramic views. On the fourth day, you will visit the fascinating Laguna de Salinas, with its natural beauty, flamingos, and the opportunity to relax in the thermal waters. With an expert guide, comfortable transport, and carefully selected accommodations, this tour is perfect for those seeking a complete experience of Arequipa. A adventure you won't want to miss!

dia1.descripcion: On Day 1, the Tour to the Sillar Route takes you to discover the Misti, Chachani, and Pichupichu volcanoes from the viewpoint, explore the Añashuayco Quarry cutting sillar like a master, walk through the Culebrillas Ravine among Wari petroglyphs, and admire the magical Apachetas. An adventure filled with history and unique landscapes!

dia2.descripcion: On Day 2, we begin the journey to one of the deepest canyons in the world, departing from the hotel to Pampa Cañahuas, where you can admire South American camelids and take photos. We continue through the Tocra wetlands, where we will see migratory birds, and pass by the crater of the extinct Chucura volcano. At the viewpoint of the volcanoes, at 4,800 m.a.s.l., you will enjoy an impressive view of the western mountain range. Upon arrival in Chivay, we check into the hotel, and in the afternoon, you will have time to relax in the Colca hot springs. Finally, enjoy dinner with a folkloric show before spending the night in Chivay.

dia3.titulo: CHIVAY / CRUZ DEL CÓNDOR / CHIVAY / AREQUIPA.
dia3.descripcion: On Day 3, after breakfast, we head to the Cruz del Cóndor viewpoint to enjoy the impressive canyon and the flight of the condor. On the way back, we will visit the towns of Pinchollo, Maca, and Yanque, with their colonial churches, and the viewpoints of Choquetico and Antahuilque, where we will see the valley's terraces and pre-Inca tombs. After lunch (not included), we depart back to Arequipa, arriving between 4:00 and 5:00 p.m.

dia4.titulo: FULL DAY AT LAGUNA DE SALINAS
dia4.descripcion: Day 4 begins with hotel pick-up and breakfast at the Alto Simbral viewpoint, where volcanoes can be observed. There will be a tour with vicuña and flamingo sightings, hiking in the Salinas Lagoon, and visits to the town of Moche and the Salar. You will also explore the hot springs of Lojen (optional), the mini volcano of Lojen and the Uzuña Dam, with activities such as boat rides and fishing. Return to Arequipa around 5:30 pm.

dia5.descripcion: On the last day, enjoy breakfast, time to visit the Main Square and buy souvenirs, and then say goodbye to the agency staff. The transfer to the airport or terminal will be 2 hours before for domestic flights and 3 hours for international flights, with the option for a tour if the flight is delayed.

START OF OUR SERVICES: Welcome to the city of AREQUIPA
Our Hotels. Check-in 11:00 A.M. check-out 09:00 A.M.
Detailed explanation of the itinerary.
TOUR TO THE SILLAR ROUTE
08:40 to 08:50 A.M: Pickup will be done within this time range for the morning shift.
13:40 to 13:50 P.M: Pickup from the hotel or the Arequipa square for the afternoon tour.
Visit to the Volcanoes Viewpoint to appreciate the Misti, Chachani, and Pichupichu volcanoes.
First stop at the Añashuayco Quarry, where the history and production of sillar are explained. Visitors can experience cutting stone.
Visit to the Culebrillas Gorge, with a 20-minute walk to observe the petroglyphs of the Wari culture.
Before returning to Arequipa, observation of the Apachetas, stone formations.
12:30 P.M: Return to the City of Arequipa.
13:15 P.M: Arrival at the historic center of Arequipa for the morning shift.
18:15 P.M: Arrival at the historic center of Arequipa if the afternoon tour is conducted.
7:30 to 8:00 A.M: Pickup from your respective hotel to start our journey to one of the deepest canyons in the world.

We take the Yura road, skirting the snow-capped Chachani towards Pampa Cañahuas (Aguada Blanca and Salinas National Reserve), habitat of beautiful South American camelids, where you can appreciate and take photos.
At the Tocra wetlands, we will see a great variety of migratory birds.
We will pass by the crater of an extinct volcano (Chucura).
We will stop at the volcano viewpoint, the highest point on the route (4,800 m.a.s.l.), where we will appreciate much of the western mountain range.
13:30 to 14:00 hours approx.: Arrival in Chivay and check-in at the hotel. Lunch (not included).
17:00 hours: In the afternoon we will enjoy the thermal baths of Colca, whose thermal waters range between 35° to 38° Celsius in the pools (entry 15 soles per person).
20:00 hours: Dinner accompanied by a folkloric show (not included, optional).
Overnight in Chivay Colca.

itinerario.titulo: CHIVAY / CRUZ DEL CÓNDOR / CHIVAY / AREQUIPA.
descripcion: 06:00 a.m: Breakfast at our hotel.
06:30 a.m: We will head to the Cruz del Cóndor viewpoint, a strategic point to observe the canyon and the flight of the condor.
On the way back, we will stop in the towns of Pinchollo, Maca, and Yanque, which have beautiful colonial churches.
We will also visit the viewpoints of Choquetico and Antahuilque, where we will see the impressive terracing of the valley, tombs, and pre-Incan models.
Lunch (not included).
13:00 p.m: Return to the city of Arequipa, arriving between 16:00 and 17:00 p.m.
Arrival in the city of Arequipa.

itinerario.titulo: FULL DAY TO THE SALINAS LAGOON
descripcion: 6:00 am to 6:30 am: Pickup from your hotel.
First stop at the Alto Simbral Viewpoint for breakfast and to observe the volcanoes.
Activities during the tour include:
- Spotting vicuñas.
- Walking in the Salinas Lagoon.
- Spotting flamingos.
- Town of Moche and Salar (known as the Arequipeño Uyuni).
- Observation of llamas and alpacas.
- Visit to the Mini volcano of Lojen.
- Lojen hot springs (entry 08.00 soles per person).
- Searching for water mirrors in the Salinas lagoons.
- Uzuña Dam, where you can do boating, kayaking, fishing, and other activities.
Lunch (not included).
Return to the historic center of Arequipa around 5:30 pm.

itinerario.titulo: FULL DAY TO THE PILLONES WATERFALL
descripcion: 06.00 a.m. Pickup from the hotel to start the tour.
06:30 a.m. Our first stop will be in the Zamacola district for last-minute shopping.

The first point we will visit is the Pampa de Arrieros town and its old train station, stopping at the Salinas and Aguada Blanca National Reserve to observe vicuñas and at the Patahuasi sector for an Inca tea or a meal.
10:15 a.m. We will head towards the Stone Forest, making a stop at the Carlitos viewpoint for views of the Arequipa volcanoes.

We will start a 40-minute walk in the Stone Forest, enjoying the incomparable landscape, which features strange rock formations and stone columns, where your imagination and fun will have no limits, and you can take photos.
Continuing the tour by vehicle, we arrive at the Pillones community where the Pillones Waterfall is located.
Upon arriving at the waterfalls, you will observe rocks shaped by water erosion; you can carefully descend to the waterfall, where you can take photos and enjoy the scenery and nature.
16:30 to 17:00 p.m. We will be returning to the city of Arequipa within this time range.
A.M: Breakfast at your respective hotel.
Afterward, you can take the opportunity to visit the Main Square for photos and souvenirs.

seo.title: MAGICAL PUNO - 4 Days / 3 Nights | MACHUPICCHU BY WORLD
seo.meta_description: Discover the magical Puno in a 4-day tour, navigating Lake Titicaca, exploring the Uros, Amantaní, and Taquile Islands, and living a unique cultural experience with a local family.

open_graph.title: Magical Puno - 4 Days / 3 Nights
open_graph.description: Experience the magic of Puno with this 4-day tour, navigating Lake Titicaca, exploring Uros, Amantaní, and Taquile Islands, and enjoying a unique cultural experience. Book your adventure now!

PunoMagico.title: MAGICAL PUNO
puntosClave: Navigate Lake Titicaca and explore the Uros, Amantaní, and Taquile Islands.
Visit the Sillustani Chullpas and enjoy stunning views of the lake.
Spend a night in a family home in Amantaní, experiencing local culture.
Bilingual professional guide to provide detailed information during the tour.
Includes transfers and 24/7 assistance via WhatsApp for your peace of mind.
PunoMagico.lugares: Sillustani - Lake Titicaca - Uros Island - Amantaní Island - Taquile Island.
PunoMagico.descripcion: Get ready for an epic adventure in Puno! Start exploring the mysterious Chullpas of Sillustani, where views of Lake Titicaca will leave you breathless. Then, navigate the majestic Lake Titicaca to the floating Uros Islands, where you will learn about their fascinating totora houses. Continue to the charming Amantaní Island for an authentic experience with a local family. The next day, discover Taquile Island, famous for its textiles and ancestral traditions. Finally, return to Puno with unforgettable memories and a smile on your face. This tour is a perfect mix of culture, nature, and fun!

dia1.descripcion: Day 1! Arrival in Puno, check-in, and rest. At 1:50 PM, tour to the Chullpas of Sillustani, with views of Lake Titicaca. Return to Puno at 5:00 PM, free time to explore.

dia2.descripcion: Day 2 of adventure! Breakfast, visit to Uros Island to explore its floating houses and navigate in rafts. Then, arrival at Amantaní Island, typical lunch, and night with a local family.

dia3.descripcion: Day 3 starts with a local breakfast and a boat trip to Taquile Island, with a welcome, cultural presentation, and traditional music. Lunch with trout and return to Puno at 5:00 PM to rest at the hotel.

dia4.descripcion: On the last day, after breakfast and transfer to Juliaca, followed by transport to the airport with 3 hours before the flight, ending the tour in Puno.

itinerario.titulo: Arrival in Juliaca City - Puno - Tour to Sillustani.
descripcion: Upon arrival in Juliaca or Puno, we will welcome you and take you to your hotel.
After check-in (12:00 PM), you will have a short rest.

Between 1:50 PM and 2:10 PM, we will start the tour to the impressive Chullpas of Sillustani. During the journey, you will enjoy views of Lake Titicaca while the guide shares interesting facts about Puno.
In Sillustani, you will explore the Chullpas del Lagarto and the beautiful Umayo lagoon.
You will also visit the Hatun Qolla community, famous for its clay crafts.
We will return to Puno around 5:00 PM, with free time to enjoy the city.
Overnight at the hotel in Puno.

itinerario.titulo: Tour to Uros and Amantaní Islands
descripcion: Between 6:00 AM and 6:40 AM, we will enjoy breakfast at the hotel or receive a box lunch with local products.
At 7:00 AM, we will depart for the Puno port to begin the adventure.
We will navigate Lake Titicaca to Uros Island, where the inhabitants will show us how they build their houses and what their daily life is like.
You can dress in traditional clothing or take a ride on their famous totora boat, the 'Mercedes Benz' (cost of 15 to 20 soles).
After that, we will continue to Amantaní Island, where a local family will welcome us with a typical lunch.
In the afternoon, we will learn more about their customs and architecture.
In the evening, we will share a local dinner and spend the night in a host family home.
Between 6:30 AM and 7:30 AM, the host family will prepare a delicious local breakfast.
Then, we will take the boat to Taquile Island, known for preserving its ancient traditions.
The president of the community will welcome us, and in the Taquile square, we will enjoy a cultural presentation, especially of their famous textiles.
During the tour, you will listen to traditional music with drums and pan flutes.
Afterwards, we will climb up to Chullano port and have lunch in a local restaurant, where you can try typical dishes like trout.
After lunch, we will return by boat to Puno, arriving around 5:00 PM to rest at the hotel.
After having breakfast at the hotel, our transport will carry out the respective transfer from the city of Puno to Juliaca.
The approximate travel time for this trip is 30 minutes.
For the transfer to the airport, we will leave 3 hours before the flight departs.
Our tour of the city of Puno concludes at the airport.

open_graph.description: Explore Puno in 5 days, from Lake Titicaca to Uros, Amantaní, and Taquile Islands, through the Temple of Fertility in Chucuito and the Sillustani Tombs.

Puno5dias.title: PUNO
puntosClave: Explore Lake Titicaca with visits to Uros, Amantaní, and Taquile, experiencing unique traditions.
Visit Sillustani and the Temple of Fertility in Chucuito with stunning cultural landscapes.
Includes tourist transportation, entrance fees, and bilingual guides for a complete experience.
Enjoy accommodation in selected hotels and one night in a family home in Amantaní.
24/7 assistance and flexible options like flights, hotels, and personalized trains.
Puno5dias.lugares: Sillustani - Lake Titicaca - Uros Island - Amantaní Island - Taquile Island - Tour to Chuicuito "Temple of Fertility"
Puno5dias.descripcion: Discover Puno, the folkloric capital of Peru and land of artists and poets. Famous for its cultural diversity, its native dances, and the celebration of the Virgin of Candelaria (February 1-14), recognized as Intangible Cultural Heritage by UNESCO. On this tour, you will explore Lake Titicaca, home to the iconic Uros islands, Amantaní, and Taquile, where you can interact with local communities and learn about their traditions. You will also visit Chucuito, known for its Temple of Fertility, and Sillustani, with its impressive chullpas. Puno offers typical dishes like quinoa soup, and in remote areas, aymara is spoken, preserving cultural roots. Visiting Puno will leave you with unforgettable memories of its people and culture.

dia1.descripcion: Day 1! Upon arrival in Juliaca or Puno, we will greet you and take you to the hotel for check-in (12:00 hrs) and a brief rest. At 13:50 hrs, we start the tour to the impressive Chullpas of Sillustani, where you will enjoy views of Lake Titicaca while learning about Puno. You will explore the Chullpas of Lagarto, the Umayo lagoon, and the community of Hatun Qolla, famous for its crafts. We return to Puno at 17:00 hrs, with free time to explore the city. A first day full of history and landscapes!

dia2.descripcion: Day 2 of adventure! We have breakfast and set sail to Uros Island, where we explore its floating houses and experience navigating on totora rafts. Then we continue to Amantaní Island, where we are welcomed with a typical lunch, explore their customs, and spend the night with a local family.

dia3.descripcion: Day 3 begins with a local breakfast, followed by a boat trip to Taquile Island, where you will enjoy a welcome, a cultural presentation, and traditional music. After a trout lunch at a local restaurant, we return to Puno around 17:00 hrs to rest at the hotel.

dia4.descripcion: On day 4, after breakfast, we will visit Chucuito, known for its Temple of Fertility (Inca Uyo) and views of Lake Titicaca. We will explore the square, the Dominican church, and some viewpoints, with free time to enjoy local food. We will return to Puno at 12:30 hrs and the afternoon will be free to rest.

dia5.descripcion: On the last day, after breakfast at the hotel, we will take transportation to the city of Juliaca, a journey of approximately 30 minutes. We will transfer to the airport with 3 hours' notice before the flight, thus concluding our tour of the city of Puno at the airport.

itinerario.titulo: Tour to Uros Island and Amantaní
descripcion: Between 06:00 and 06:40 hrs, we will enjoy breakfast at the hotel, or receive a box lunch with local products.
At 07:00 A.M., we will depart for the port of Puno to begin the adventure.
We will navigate Lake Titicaca to Uros Island, where the inhabitants will show us how they build their houses and what their daily life is like.

In the afternoon, we will learn more about their customs and architecture.
In the evening, we will share a local dinner and spend the night in the host family's house.

After lunch, we will return by boat to Puno, arriving around 17:00 hrs to rest at the hotel.

During the journey, you will enjoy beautiful views of Lake Titicaca.
In Chucuito, we will visit the Temple of Fertility, or Inca Uyo, famous for its curious stones.
The guide will explain the importance of the Temple as an astronomical observatory.
We will also explore the square of Chucuito, its Dominican church, and some viewpoints with views of the lake.
